title: Lufthansa Says Apple AirTags Are Once Again Allowed in Checked Bags
description: The airline reversed itself Wednesday, saying it had consulted with German aviation authorities, who agreed that Bluetooth trackers were safe for passengers to use.

title: Lucid Increases Electric Vehicle Production but Still Faces Challenges
description: The maker of electric sedans said it would hit its scaled-back production targets for 2022 after facing supply hurdles.

title: The Google Watch Is Here. But You’d Better Love Android.
description: Developed with Fitbit, Google’s first smart watch takes a page from Apple’s playbook by requiring loyalty to its brand.

title: Human Brain Cells Grow in Rats, and Feel What the Rats Feel
description: Human brain “organoids” wired themselves into rats’ nervous systems, influencing the animals’ sensations and behaviors.

title: Misinformation Swirls in Non-English Languages Ahead of Midterms
description: More multilingual fact-checking groups are pushing back against misleading translations, manipulated images and outright lies that jump platforms and cross borders.

title: Can Start-Ups Significantly Lower the Cost of Gene Sequencing?
description: Companies like Ultima Genomics say they have the technology, which could lead to medical breakthroughs. But similar promises in the past have fizzled and barriers remain.
